text: Is there an endpoint to get module metadata?
what do you consider module metadata?
I don’t believe there is anything for this atm

figured but thought I would ask.

Thanks <@U25PYL3Q8>

This is the first time I've encountered it, which is why I reached out here! I also reached out to our HS Channel Consultant, and she hadn't seen a scenario like this either. So probably not THAT common.
Hoping we’ll have some clarity on this stuff soon
